          COMPUTER APPLICATIONS IN ENGINEERING EDUCATION  
               Software for Vol. 1, No. 3, Page 229
    ____________________________________________________________

 The program application included here is SEDIF. For more
 information on the program, refer to the article, "A New 
 Educational Packet for Passive and Active Filter Design," by
 J. Ruiz, E. Aramendi, and A. Ubierna.
 
 To load the application, download the CAE13229.ZIP file to a
 directory such as \CAE-MENU\SEDIF and unzip the file there.
 You can load the SEDIF program by typing SEDIF at the DOS 
 command line or by clicking on the SEDIF.EXE file in a Windows
 file manager.
  
 Good luck.
